doc.name: last
doc.summary: Specifies the last member of a set of objects or the last chunk of a string.

examples.example: put the ID of last card into stoppingPoint
put the last line of it after field "Answers"

description.p: The last keyword can be used to specify any object whose number property is equal to the number of objects of that type. It can also be used to designate the last chunk in a chunk expression.
The last control is the topmost control on a card. The last button is the topmost button, and similarly for other types of controls.
The word the is optional when using the last keyword.
A reference to the last of a string, with no chunk type specified, yields the entire string.
